title: No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog
description: Bug 4329: No results If searched via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
OB: When searching via the Package view selection and dialog, no results are displayed.
EB: When searching via the Package view selection and dialog, the expected behavior is to display search results for declarations. However, currently, no results are shown.
SR:
1. Open the Package view selection and dialog.
2. Perform a search for declarations.
3. Observe that no results are displayed.
notes: Search via context menu in the packages view works. In Java, the search should first try to get the Java element. If that fails, it should display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
